languages.text: The character suffers +(number of vulnerable stacks × {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus})% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g}'s attacks.
